about_the_game:
-You can choose three Easten Immortals become a team from five different heroes(sword, blade, whip, stick, and bow, )
-Each Immortals has three exclusive skills and two attribute bonuses.
-Each Immortals has their own unique team bonus.
-In the initial game, choose a Immortals to start the game, and as the game progresses, you will encounter other Immortals to fight together.
-As the game progresses, you will upgrade to acquire different abilities and skills.
-During the game, monsters and bosses will become increasingly powerful, and it is important to keep a distance from them at all times.
detailed_description:
Contact


This game is in the public testing stage and we will actively listen to the opinions of players for improvement and refinement game.
If you like this game,please add wishlist!Thank you for your support.


Update plan


Content update plan:
Phase 1: Kunlun Mountain (Snow Mountain) Map Boss and its skills. After defeating them, they can be selected as initial heroes, and the number of available heroes can be increased to 6.
Phase 2: Forest and Swamp Map Production and Boss. After defeat, it can be used as an initial hero selection, with an increase of 7 available heroes.
Phase 3: Creating a map of the Inferno Volcano and having a boss. After defeating it, it can be used as an initial hero choice, with an additional 8 available heroes.
Phase 4: Leichi Map Creation and Boss. After defeat, it can be used as the initial hero selection, and the number of available heroes can be increased to 9.
Phase 5: Desert map creation and boss. After defeat, it can be used as the initial hero selection, and the number of available heroes can be increased to 10.


Optimize and update content (long-term):
1. Regularly update and optimize the hero's various skills based on player feedback.
2. Update and optimize the system UI interface based on player feedback.
3. Based on player feedback, update and optimize monster attributes and types, improve the frequency and exclusive skills of elite monsters.
4. Based on player feedback, update and optimize the basic damage and attributes of each hero.


About the Game


-You can choose three Easten Immortals become a team from five different heroes(sword, blade, whip, stick, and bow, )
-Each Immortals has three exclusive skills and two attribute bonuses.
-Each Immortals has their own unique team bonus.
-In the initial game, choose a Immortals to start the game, and as the game progresses, you will encounter other Immortals to fight together.
-As the game progresses, you will upgrade to acquire different abilities and skills.
-During the game, monsters and bosses will become increasingly powerful, and it is important to keep a distance from them at all times.
name: ImmortalSurvivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 或 Windows 10 (仅限64位系统)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S @ 2.5 GHz / AMD FX 6120 @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB), 或更佳
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 安装最新驱动的，兼容DirectX的声卡
  • Additional Notes: Windows兼容键盘和鼠标 / 微软Xbox One 手柄
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 或 Windows 10 (仅限64位系统)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 @ 3.2 GHz / AMD FX 8120 @ 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) / GTX 970 (4GB) / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB) 或better / AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB) 或更佳
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 安装最新驱动的，兼容DirectX的声卡
  • Additional Notes: Windows兼容键盘和鼠标 / 微软Xbox One 手柄

short_description: Immortal Survivors is an Eastern style top-down rouge like game. You can selecting different characters,and upgrade exclusive hero skills, to build a unique combat team. The free trial version has now been released. Come and open the game, choose your favorite hero to fight!
